Call Type Description: Customers calling to inquire about product features, specifications, sizes, colors, and availability of sports shoes from various brands such as Nike, Adidas, Vans, and others.
Common Inquiries: Product dimensions, material, price, shipping, color options

Call Type Description: Customers calling to track their online orders, inquire about shipping status, or request updates on delivery times.
Common Inquiries: Order status, shipping details, delivery times, tracking numbers

Call Type Description: Customers calling to initiate a return or exchange of a purchased product due to various reasons such as incorrect size, wrong color, or defects.
Common Inquiries: Return policy, exchange process, refund timelines, replacement options

Call Type Description: Customers calling to inquire about ongoing promotions, discounts, or special offers on sports shoes from various brands.
Common Inquiries: Discount codes, sale dates, promotion details, price matches

Call Type Description: Customers calling to create or manage their online accounts, reset passwords, or inquire about loyalty programs.
Common Inquiries: Account login, password reset, loyalty rewards, registration process

Call Type Description: Agents calling customers to confirm their online orders, verify shipping details, and provide order summaries.
Common Inquiries: Order confirmation, shipping details, payment verification

Call Type Description: Agents calling customers to inform them about exclusive promotions, special offers, or new product releases from various sports shoe brands.
Common Inquiries: Promotion details, product features, price, availability

Call Type Description: Agents calling customers to gather feedback on their recent purchases, ratings, or reviews of sports shoes from various brands.
Common Inquiries: Product satisfaction, ratings, review process, feedback questions

Call Type Description: Agents calling inactive or dormant customers to win them back with special offers, loyalty rewards, or new product releases.
Common Inquiries: Special offers, loyalty rewards, new products, win-back incentives

Call Type Description: Agents calling customers to participate in surveys or research studies to gather insights on sports shoe preferences, purchasing habits, and brand loyalty.
Common Inquiries: Survey questions, research topics, participation incentives, survey duration
